subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: Acquired for $46 million with the hope that he could be a rotation stalwart, Kei Igawa lasted 16 games with the Yankees before being banished to the minors.
snippet: Acquired for $46 million with the hope that he could be a rotation stalwart, Kei Igawa lasted 16 games with the Yankees before being banished to the minors.
